doc:
Philip L. Clarke https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philip_L._Clarke 0 Philip Lewis Clarke (September 8, 1938 – April 23, 2013) was an American voice actor. He provided voices in various TV series, films, and video games, but is most notable for his leading role as Malcolm Betruger in Doom 3. Philip_Lewis_Clarke ( September_8_,_1938 – April_23_,_2013 ) was an_American_voice_actor . He provided voices in various_TV_series , films , and video_games , but is most_notable for his_leading_role as Malcolm_Betruger in Doom_3 .
